text_block_list.text:
――Oh man～, I'm really sorry okay? It's got me really 
down too～, ah, how you feelin'? Thoughts on the 
muscle soreness after that Limit Break?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
After that I ended up trying to use Parallel Running(?) 
with Daitaku Helios…… and it didn't end well for 
me, so I had to take a few days off.
choice_data_list: I looked over your track record
I looked over your track record

text_block_list.text:
Eh! What's that!? Sounds kinda embarrassing～! Is it that? They 
created a bit of a buzz on UmaTok before, those black disks that 
can play music, right?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
choice_data_list: No, like results of your mock race
No, like results of your mock race

text_block_list.text:
That was where I recognized it…… that she wasn't 
weak. Rather, she had magnificent speed and potential―― 
she was someone who could win.

Where'd they upload that? Umasta? Umatter? I want 
to see it too～ actually, I'd rather run it again, 
a mock race! Should we send some invites～?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text: 'kay-check-roger!!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Sounds fun! Actually, when I think about it, I've been playing 
too much☆ Forgot I needed a trainer to debut, hilarious!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
……Eh, wait a sec? I think I just noticed something crazy!? 
Trai-pi…… is short for trainer, right? Aren't you a trainer!?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Whaddaya know～. Then Trai-pi just needs to be my trainer☆ We're 
already best buds♪ And it's not like you hate me, right～?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
choice_data_list: But you haven't chosen me yet
But you haven't chosen me yet

text_block_list.text: Eh?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Sorry, what's that mean? Huh?? Da heck? 
It needs more than a contract? Is it a state of mind??
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
choice_data_list: Right. If I can make it more fun……
Right. If I can make it more fun……

text_block_list.text:
I need to show her that running with me is the 
way to fulfill her dream. If I can show her that 
it'll be a "never-ending festival" then――

……Hmm, got it. Orrrr, maybe I don't? As long as it's fun, 
I don't mind either way! Right, lookin' forward to it～☆
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
And so, in preparation for the next Selection Race, 
I watched over Daitaku Helios' training. And then――

――Oooooh～! Things are startin' to heat up―☆! 
Everyone's on fire! Crazy awesome!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Looks like Daitaku Helios has an instructor now. 
But that trainer…… can they properly keep her under control?
text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
It's over as soon as she goes wild. That girl 
will just end up doing whatever is fun at the 
time…… I don't think she can race seriously.
text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Wei, yeah! 
"DJ Helios goes Boom boom boom!" right☆?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
―Don't laugh until you're at the peak!? 
What does that even mean～～!?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Until now, she's run while only focused on the fun in the moment. 
You can't really call that a "Race".
choice_data_list: You need to hold back until then
You need to hold back until then

text_block_list.text:
Impossible! 'Cuz it's all super fun! 
Let's not do the whole holding back thing, no way no way no way!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text: Eh?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
『Oh! It's here, it's here～～!! 
I really like this song!! Let's dance!』
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
The DJ was gauging the mood on the floor. They 
would gradually increase the tempo in reaction 
to the crowd's excitement to maximize it――

――Almost like they were creating a "wave". Rather than using only 
one tone, they chose to fuse and mix several, creating a swirl 
and surge. That kind of "fun".

Races were the same. If she runs well, her opponents will follow 
suit. That, in itself, should make the race more exciting for her.
choice_data_list: The Peak…… catch the biggest wave!

text_block_list.text:
……!!!! 
A big wave…… count me in!!!!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
……! Catch a wave! I'll do it! 
Seriously, I won't laugh!!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
――Scope out the floor, match the tempo, and read the mood! 
So I can make it more fun!!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Alright, then for that first-class thrill! 
Blitz Captain Helios, sallies forth!!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text: ――Uraaaaaaaaaaah!!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Uwah, there goes Helios! 
If that girl is here, then this race is gonna be wild!
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A

text_block_list.text:
She'll just wear herself out eventually. 
So the ones I need to worry about are――
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B

text_block_list.text:
(Ahー, they're falling back? 
I see, I see, so the beat is slow, huh? Got it!)
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Daitaku Helios was focused. And the others don't seem 
to have realized that "she's racing" yet……

Alright, it's about time I make a move……! 
Huh, wha-what's going on!?
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A

text_block_list.text:
Helios' pace isn't dropping at all!? 
……Eh, wait, wait, eh, no way……!?
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B

text_block_list.text:
(It's here, it's here, it's here!! 
This is it! The big waveーーーー! Then……!)
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
I just need to catch it～～～～! 
Uwahahahahahaaaa!!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text: Eeeeeeeeh～～～～!?
text_block_list.name: Everyone

text_block_list.text:
(Wild, I made a super huge wave!? 
Kuuuu～～～～, crazy, fun to the MAX～～～～!!)
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
『If I can make it more fun…… 
then make me your trainer』

『If I can make it more fun…… 
then make me your trainer』

(Hahaa…… this is what they meant, huh! Yeah, yeah yeah yeah! 
Wait, if this is what's on deck…… then wouldn't hangin' with 
Trai-pi be the best!?)
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
――And then…… it really would be a never-ending festival!! 
Uraaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
――First place～～～!! Hell yeah☆ 
Awesome! Crazy! Seriously lit! Trai-pi we～i!!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Got that right☆ Then, up next for me and Trai-pi! 
Can't be anything but the Twinkle Series, right!?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Seriously, lookin' forward to it, Trainer☆ 
Ah, still need my seal? Photo ID, okay?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
And so…… I formed a trainer contract with Daitaku Helios, 
a bright, lively, fun―loving―― party Uma Musume.

――Right, on to today's training, let's move it☆ 
Move it☆ Move it move it☆
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
We～i! Who's it today? A shadow? A local? Wei? 
A rough-houser? Whoever it is, come on――
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
――……Nice to meet you, my name is Daiichi Ruby. 
I look forward to working with you today.
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text: I can't.
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text: ……excuse me?
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text: Luv.
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Love! Je t'aime! Toooo～～tally my type!! 
Would you be my number one main squeeze!?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text: Eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeh!?
text_block_list.name: Uma Musume
